title: Raises tax credits for long-term care insurance from twenty percent to fifty percent
summary: Raises tax credits for long-term care insurance from twenty percent to fifty percent; applies to the corporation tax, franchise tax on business corporations, personal income tax, franchise tax on banking corporations, and franchise tax on insurance corporations.
